lead_paragraph: Romario, the former World Cup winner turned senator, called in a report on Wednesday for the indictment of seven Brazilian football officials in what he called "the biggest sports scandal of all time."

headline.print_headline: Romario Calls for Indictments of Brazil Football Bosses
headline.main: Romario Calls for Indictments of Brazil Football Bosses
